Omiscid::StringVariableAttribute

Omiscid::StringVariableAttribute Class Reference

Group an integer with its representation in the service description. More...

void SetValue (SimpleString value)
 Write access to the integer value.

Detailed Description

Group an integer with its representation in the service description.

The methods enable to manipulate the integer value, and to modify the description automatically.

Author:
Vaufreydaz Dominique
